page.title: 20ENTERTAINMENT IN E. MERSEA
page.content: Apart from events organised by church groups and other local organisations there are few entertainments. A focal point is provided by the Dog and Pheasant public house which has a restaurant.There is a Country Park.abundant wildlife and attractive sea walks.The nearest cinema and theatre is in Colchester 14kms away. From July 19th.-21st. 1985 a festival of the World of Music, Arts and Dance(WOMAD)was held at the Youth Camp in East Mersea. Some 40 acts from 18 different countries were due to perform for an estimated audience of 10,000. {THE DATA AND INFORMATION ON EAST {MERSEA FOR THE DOMESDAY PROJECT WERE {COLLECTED AND WRITTEN BY STAFF AND {PUPILS AT COLCHESTER ROYAL GRAMMAR {SCHOOL CO-ORDINATED BY MR.G.P.MASLEN.}
